name: Eyedol Contact
description:
A small puzzle game where you use your Eyedol contacts to press buttons.

Credits
  • Levi Ellis and Fırat Zengin - amazing music
  • RedTeapot (me) - idea, code, graphics, sfx
  • GrafxKid - fancy color palette (OIL 6)
  • The font: Press Start 2P
Known issues
  • The audio may be stuttering or popping in Chrome. If this bothers you, you can try using Firefox or downloading the Wndows version
Controls

The hints are provided in-game, but here's a backup:

  • WASD/arrows to move
  • R to restart the level
  • T to skip the level (after a couple of restarts
Tools used
  • Godot - the one and only game engine
  • Aseprite - super fancy pixel art editor
  • LabChirp - cool sfx generator
  • Inkscape - nice vector graphics editor (used it for the thumbnail)
  • Brain - ties it all together when it works
